Event.name: Being_born
Event.definition:
<def-root>This frame concerns the inception of the life of a <fen>Child</fen>, generally human, at a particular <fen>Time</fen> and <fen>Place</fen>. The <fen>Relatives</fen> may also be mentioned.
<ex><fex name="Child">Little Jessie</fex> <t>came into the world</t> <fex name="Time">at 8 last night</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the birth occurs, generally expressed as a date or a year.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Child</fen> enters the world.</def-root>

Arg.name: Relatives
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individuals that the <fen>Child</fen> is related to, including the male and female individuals that come together to produce a <fen>Child</fen> (the parents), as well those who are related to them by birth or marriage.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state of the <fen>Child</fen> as it enters the world.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The way in which the <fen>Child</fen> leaves the womb; this FE is typically only filled by phrases such as <ment>by natural birth</ment> or <ment>by Caesarian</ment>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: born.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: existing as a result of birth.
